name: Hot Coffee in Autumn
description:
Life has been stressful! But it is cozy season, so have some coffee and relax.

You can make several hot beverages, so experiment around! There is no goal. Just have some well-deserved atmosphere.

This game uses Godot 4 Beta 1. The beta's HTML export isn't quite perfect so please download instead.

Made for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022

You can download the art to use in your projects, licensed under CC-BY-3.0. All other art and assets can be found in Sources.txt
